text: my code for today: def calc_neuron(inputs, weights, bias):     out = 0     i = len(inputs) - 1     while i >= 0:         out = out + inputs[i] * weights[i]         i = i - 1     return out + bias  # Bias of neurons in the current layer bias = [1, 6, 2]  # Outputs of neurons in the previous layer inputs = [5, 3, 2]  # Weights of inputs with neurons of this layer weights = [     [0.25, 0.50, 0.25],  # weights for neuron 1     [0.35, 0.47, 0.18],  # weights for neuron 2     [0.21, 0.12, 0.77]   # weights for neuron 3 ]  n = 0 out = [] for i in bias:     out.append(calc_neuron(inputs, weights[n], bias[n]))     n = n + 1  print(out)
